text:
Created attachment 33834
patch against trunk

The Javadoc of T_BYTES field and T_CHARS field in org.apache.tomcat.util.buf.MessageBytes are incorrect.
creator: nakamura.kyohei.lab@gmail.com
markt@apache.org
text:
Thanks for the report and the patch. This has been fixed in:
- 9.0.x for 9.0.0.M5 onwards
- 8.5.x for 8.5.1 onwards
- 8.0.x for 8.0.34 onwards
- 7.0.x for 7.0.70 onwards
- 6.0.x for 6.0.46 onwards
